Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma spray (APS) was used to prepare the planar positive/electrolyte/negative (PEN) and mono-block layer built (MOLB) type PEN solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: On the basis of the spraying conditions optimized previously and the self-developed functionally graded powder feeder system, two types of PEN cells were fabricated.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: Then the microstructure and material composition of the PEN cells were analyzed.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: The results show that graded layers formed between the electrodes and electrolyte.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: Moreover, the material composition and the porosity of the graded layers vary gradually.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: In particular, the porosities of the resultant anode and cathode reach 32.74 and 32.24%, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: Using the AC complex impedance technique, the conductivity of the MOLB type composite electrode is tested.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the MOLB type composite electrode with the graded layers is larger than that without the graded layers.
Titulo: Fabrication of functionally graded SOFC by APS
